text: Hi, we have just pushed live our first serverless function into our live portal, we were wondering if there was ways to monitor the activity or usage, like if there a dashboard for collecting the data
You would have to create your own dashboard.

I believe HubSpot meters execution time per minuteâ€”isn't there a transparent way to see the same data they're looking at? I see that we can look at the serverless logs for individual execution times, but I don't think anyone is going to manually check those all the time.  There should be a dashboard displaying usage data that would alert you of overages.

topic:
